ref: 12964 sáṁbhavati ʻ becomes, is associated with ʼ RV., ʻ exists ʼ ŚBr., ʻ is contained in, is adequate ʼ MBh., ʻ is capable of holding ʼ Pāṇ., ʻ enters, attains ʼ Yājñ., ʻ is possible ʼ Hit. [√bhū]
Pa. sambhavati, sambhōti ʻ is present, reaches, is capable of ʼ;
M. sãbhavṇẽ ʻ to be possible, be probable ʼ. -- X saṁmāti q.v. <-> See saṁbhāvayati.
